如果有人想试试这款游戏，在这个版本我的建议是：别买，快逃
这一次次的更新给我的感觉就是：该解决的平衡问题没有解决，净整了些没用的花里胡哨的。
幻境超越=明削暗改，地图氛围还没见好到哪里去，以前的地图我能分清方向，现在进图好家伙怎么哪都一个样（以前的庄园和车库比现在的好看多了！！）
并且我从没见过比这一次还屎的更新版本，和写实根本搭不上届的人物动作，仿佛为了折磨玩家而设计的HUD，我从2017年入坑开始最喜欢的就是黎明杀机简洁传神的UI设计，但这次更新真的让这个游戏没那味了，更别提这版本拉稀一样的操作手感…我进图跑了一圈就想直接卸载游戏…………我不想为了皮肤打通行证而打开这个游戏，我更想回到以前那个人类不会速修，杀手能轻松上段，没有那么多皮肤，但是玩法更多的时候。
这是我上steam玩的第一个游戏，也可能是我最喜欢的一个游戏，希望制作组能回调这次的更新内容（而且你看看这次更新后差评涨了多少），不然我就回去打命运2了（我不想打命运2求求你改回去）
Да что с этим подбором игроков за сурва в соло играть не возможно !!!!! Не можете ни как исправить только капли теряются а не зарабатываются !!!!!

The core game itself is enjoyable, but some of the issues on this game are borderline unacceptable for a 4 year old game. We've legit had to wait half an hour in matchmaking, only to get paired with people either too low level for us meaning they didn't get an enjoyable match or too high level for us meaning we didn't either. The animations are really, really poor, and some of the game models are borderline laughable. It's hard to believe that a 4 year old game still has places where your character can get stuck (on old maps, not even new ones), and we already got a good match ruined by that. The game runs ok, but there's very little you can change in game settings (low, mid, high, dynamic res and that's it), so if you have a slow computer that's not enough for medium but can do better than low, you are stuck with the low preset. Also vsync is forced and I think it's not triple-buffered, so if your game drops from 60fps, I'm pretty sure you'll instantly get 30fps. 
So all in all, I think the game has its enjoyment, and that's why I'm giving it a recommended, but for the love of god does it have issues.
Please fix the PS3 models and animations, fix matchmaking, fix the 65mb updates that take half an hour to install and let me turn off that godawful TAA that makes the screen look like it's full of vaseline at low resolutions. Thank you.

Dead by Daylight bych dal 8/10.

В данный момент был введен новый матчмейкинг. Работает он абсолютно ужасно и несправедливо, в зависимости от ситуации он может вам давать маньяка который вас и коснуться не сможет, так и маньяка который вас расчленит всех за 5 минут. За маньяка анологичная ситуация, при чем еще более болезненная. Если бы я пришел в игру в этот момент, не купил бы ни одного длс и не играл бы в нее никогда. Прежде чем покупать узнавайте у игроков, пофиксили/убрали ли этот матчмейкинг.(при чем проблема именно в нем, так как данные для него по словам разрабов собирали пару месяцев, значит он кривой по своей сути).
UPD 14.07.2020 Систему матчмейкинга откатили, теперь играть в принципе не так уж и больно, а в целом игра фановая, особенно с корешами, поэтому апдейтаю обзор

RATING :              2.33 / 5            STARS

*This is only because I enjoy KYF and some survivor matches. (when there isnt an overpowered killer)*



To the killers and to the survivors. This game has a lot of issues. 





Pros
-Wonderful game to play with your friend (KYF or Kill your friends) *A custom lobby where someone is killer and there are 4 survivors. usually, one would play just to have a good time or to prove something. 

-A wide choice of killers and survivors. 

-Plenty of hours of fun if you have the patience. 







                 Cons (which there are a loooooooooooooooot)

- Hitbox.    Anyone that has played dead by daylight will be able to agree with me on this one. This is the games major issue. In one of my recent games. Killer swung twords me. 30 ping. nothing but air between me and the killer and i was hit. Explain that one. 

-Over powered killers      To add onto the hitbox, lets make the killers twice as hard to combat against.    This can be to an insta rev chainsaw which downs in one go. To stalking your prey through feilds of corn. And still being able to get one tap abilities (Ghost face).  

-Broken Ranking System    imagine getting the game for the first time, and your first impressions are ruined. You load into a game. Being a rank 20, But at the end of the game and pretty much no hooks, or almost no hits. You see that your pray has played this game for a while. Going against rank 2-13

-Toxic Community    A lot of people can be toxic, once you get into the game and understand how someone can be toxic (camping, bagging, and more) It makes the game almost unbearable to play at times. 

Overview and personal thoughts : The game can be really fun. But you have to have patience with it and want to play it. There have been many times where i have gotten close to wanting to smash my monitor because of the impossible hitboxes. Most of the time, you can't counter the killers. Especially when they are 10 ranks ahead of you. It makes it almost impossible to get away from the killers. Wanting a somewhat chill normal game is near impossible anymore. 


To the developers :  If theres some thing i could say to you in person. Is fix the hitboxes. This has been a maaaaaaajor issue with your game. Everything else in it is great. But when im versing a OP killer, and they are 2-4 Jake length away. (with mouse 1 attack button not M2 normal attack so food for thought) It makes the game almost unbearable to continue. Countless times I recall deleting the game because of this.
